0.1.name: wordpress/etruel-stock-in-list-for-eshop
0.1.description:
Plugin for eshop plugin of Rich Pedley . Show a checkbox clickable of "Out of Stock" in one column in the list of posts then you do not need edit a post only for change this value. If the user haven`t "eshop" capabilities then only see if have stock.

May be PHP5 is required!
